select_choices_or_calculations: 0, None | 1, Study intervention interrupted | 2, Study intervention modified | 3, Study intervention discontinued

field_label: Outcome
select_choices_or_calculations: 1, Not recovered/not resolved | 2, Recovered/resolved | 3, Recovered/resolved with sequelae | 4, Recovering/resolving | 5, Death | 99, Unknown
